alert.note: Alert for Carter; Custer; Fallon; Powder River (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 26 at 3:18PM MDT until October 27 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. * WHERE...Carter, Custer, Fallon, and Powder River. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, are slick, snow covered, and hazardous. The weight of snow on tree limbs may down power lines and could cause sporadic power outages. Plan on difficult travel conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Thursday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will taper off overnight tonight.
info.instruction: For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Persons should consider delaying travel. If travel is absolutely necessary, drive with extreme caution. Consider taking a winter storm kit along with you, including such items as tire chains, booster cables, flashlight, shovel, blankets and extra clothing. Also take water, a first aid kit, and anything else that would help you survive in case you become stranded.
